company.name: UseClevr
company.mission: Turn raw data into instant intelligence using AI so teams can make better decisions with zero technical complexity.
company.vision: Make advanced data analytics accessible to every business through AI automation.
company.description: UseClevr is an AI-powered data automation platform that transforms CSV files, spreadsheets, and Snowflake data into instant insights, summaries, dashboards, and decision-ready intelligence.

data_assistant.name: UseClevr Data Assistant
data_assistant.description: Upload a CSV or connect Snowflake and ask any question in natural language to get instant insights, charts, summaries, and automated reports.

pricing.start: UseClevr offers simple monthly plans based on usage.

plans.name: Starter
plans.description: For small teams or individuals who want instant data insights.

plans.name: Pro
plans.description: For businesses that need advanced analytics and Snowflake integration.

pricing.custom: Enterprise plans available for large teams or custom requirements.

faq.what_is_useclevr: UseClevr is an AI data assistant that automates analytics. Upload a CSV or connect Snowflake, ask any question, and get instant insights, charts, and summaries.
faq.services: UseClevr provides AI-powered data automation, instant analytics, dashboard generation, and automated report creation.
faq.products: UseClevr offers the UseClevr Data Assistant: an AI platform for turning CSVs and Snowflake data into insights.
faq.pricing: UseClevr offers a Starter plan, Pro plan, and Enterprise custom pricing based on usage.
faq.who_is_it_for: Designed for founders, operations teams, marketers, analysts, and SMBs.

commands.summary: Generate high-level summaries of data, documents, or business topics.

internal_admin.notes: Admin mode is only for internal use. Public users should not see admin tools.
